title: Fierce Female Outlaw: Bandit Queen (1950 Western) Directed by William Berke

sources.title: Fierce Female Outlaw: Bandit Queen (1950 Western) Directed by William Berke
sources.description:
She Sought Revenge With a WHIP...a GUN...a KISS!
Zara Montalve, returns to her native California in time to see her parents murdered for their hacienda and gold by Sheriff Jim Harding and his gang. Posing as Lola Belmont, an American visiting from Detroit, she teams up with Joaquin Murietta, posing as Carlos Del Rio, to form a Robin-Hood type band that takes vengeance on the gang and restores stolen gold to its rightful owners, aided by militia leader Dan Hinsdale.

Watch the B&W version : https://youtu.be/xAmhaehaP0I

Directed by William Berke

Main cast:
Barbara Britton - Zara Montalvo / Lola Belmont
Willard Parker - Dan Hinsdale
Phillip Reed - Joaquin Murietta / Carlos Del Rio
Barton MacLane - Sheriff Jim Harden
Martin Garralaga - Father Antonio
Victor Kilian - Jos√© Montalvo
Thurston Hall - Governor

Release date: December 22, 1950 
Filming location: San Fernando Valley, California
